column3: Strathclyde Institute for Pharmacy & Biomedical Sciences
column5: his unique course enables pharmacists (registered with the General Pharmaceutical Council) to develop as advanced clinical practitioners within a peer group learning environment. The course is flexible with a choice of classes that look at specific practice and personal development needs.Three new modules have been developed for 2023/24, specifically to meet the needs of pharmacists today:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
